ygData.subject: Re: Did I call it right or what?
ygData.msgSnippet: Why don t you shut up, you jerk? I told everyone the information, and unfortunately I had to give it to you too, but I wasn t going to be a jerk and not give
ygData.messageBody:
Why don't you shut up, you jerk? I told everyone the information, and
unfortunately I had to give it to you too, but I wasn't going to be a jerk
and not give it to everyone else just because you are a jerk.

>Yup, I knew exactly what kind of message to expect from this troll,
>something along the lines of: "I wanted to help but you were mean to me, so
>now its your fault you don't know".
>
>
>What I'm unsure of is how was this one-list chosen to be your trolling
>grounds? Did you figure it would be the place most likely to give you
>attention because we seemed so intent on finding out new things about
>tinkering?
>
>
>At anyrate, until I read otherwise, you don't know jack, you don't have any
>good leads, any good knowledge, any good anything. Until I see it in black
>and white, your just a troll trying to get some attention...
>
>Rotgut
>
